content_independence: Independent content project sponsored by Siebert

tone_guidelines: Avoid financial jargon or explain clearly
Include specific examples and real numbers
brand_identity.core_message: Building financial knowledge for long-term wealth creation

characteristics: Interested in learning about personal finance
pain_points: Believing they need lots of money to start investing
Difficulty relating to traditional financial advice

newsletter_structure.format: Mobile-first: Short paragraphs (max 2-3 sentences), visual breaks

sections.name: Intro Greeting
sections.purpose: Cultural hook connecting to trending topic + preview of value
sections.format:
**[Catchy Title - max 9 words]**
Hey Wealthbuilders,
[Cultural hook + preview - educational tone]
sections.guidelines: Avoid promotional language. Educational tone only. No exclamation marks.

sections.name: Feature Story
sections.purpose: Main financial news with educational context
sections.format:
**[Section Header]**
[Main financial news with educational context]
[Balanced perspective on trends]
**Context:** [Educational insight - 30 words max]

sections.name: Market Reality Check
sections.purpose: 3-4 key financial trends with Gen Z context
sections.format:
**[Reality-focused header]**
[3-4 key financial trends with educational context]
[Bullet points with dot character - NO emoji bullets]
requirements: Use dot bullets only - NO emoji bullets
